public static org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration getConfiguration(DBConfig dbConfig)

getProperties

public static java.util.Properties getProperties(java.lang.String jdbc_url,
                                                 java.lang.String jdbc_driver_class,
                                                 java.lang.String db_vendor,
                                                 java.lang.String user,
                                                 java.lang.String password,
                                                 boolean showSQL)
This method creates and returns Hibernate Properties.

Parameters:
jdbc_url - Host_to_the_database/database_name
jdbc_driver_class - driver used to connect
db_vendor - database vendor
user - user name
password - password
showSQL - set to true in order to print all SQL-queries to the console
Returns:
hibernate properties based on the consumed parameters
